title: Contribute to Open Source
description: Build a great persona around the Open Source with Web Development
pointers: Contribute to 10+ repositories with (50+) big contributions
Build 4 Open Source Projects (Hackathon Projects Acceptable)

title: Diversify my Income
description: In 2024 this will be my main goal, and also the one that is going to take of my time and effort.
pointers: Make a minimum $10k from Upwork and Fiverr (10+ clients / month)
Make some money through Affialte Marketing
Write and Sell (2 Ebooks) around Web Development
Build a Sass (Chrome Extensions, APIs or Component Libraries)

title: Consistently post High-Quality content
description: Post content daily (starting from 10th Jan) on Twitter, LinkedIn and Instagram regularly
pointers: Daily twitter thread (a guide or a tip)
On LinkedIn around my Achievements and Learnings (~ Cross-Post)

title: Build more projects
description: This is to keep my track towards upskilling myself and daily learning
pointers: Build 100+ Big Level projects (Hackathon Projects Acceptable)
Build 1 Sass Project ~ can be a simple one
